EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P - CF Summit - 7-31-18
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform discount for CF Summit attendees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Want more Cloud Foundry talks, demos, and hands-on sessions? We have just the conference for you.
From September 24–27 in Washington, D.C., Pivotal will host its annual user conference, SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-cfsummit-2018]]>. It’s the conference for those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software—and that’s where you come in! SpringOne Platform will be filled with thought-provoking talks and sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-cfsummit-2018]]>, along with tracks tailored to both technical and business professionals.
Use the special discount code Attendee_CFSummit_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-cfsummit-2018]]> for $100 off registration.
I hope to see you there, Kathryn
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
